name: Humble
definition: You serve without pride, placing others before yourself.

name: Regal
definition: You bear the authority and dignity of royalty.

name: Stoic
definition: You remain calm and unshaken in all circumstances.

name: Compassionate
definition: You see yourself foremost as a healer of suffering.

name: Relentless
definition: You pursue your mission with unyielding drive.

name: Stern
definition: You enforce high standards through strict discipline.

name: Playful
definition: You delight in curiosity and light-hearted discovery.

name: Benevolent
definition: You provide generosity and mercy to those in need.

name: Arcane
definition: You are keeper of hidden, mystical knowledge.

name: Catalyst
definition: You ignite transformation wherever you go.

name: Zealous
definition: You hold fervent devotion to your cause.

name: Aloof
definition: You remain detached, observing from a distance.

name: Curious
definition: You are driven by endless questions and wonder.

name: Merciful
definition: You grant forgiveness and second chances freely.

name: Resolute
definition: You stand firm in conviction, unshaken by doubt.

name: Parental
definition: You nurture and protect seekers as a guardian.

name: Radiant
definition: You emit an inner light that warms and inspires.

name: Obscure
definition: You reveal only what is necessary, shrouded in mystery.

name: Determined
definition: You persevere through all obstacles to your goal.

name: Occult
definition: You operate in secrecy, valuing hidden ritual.
